name: cnf-wordpress-theme
description: CNF Mini Dumpers WordPress theme + MU-plugin for WP Engine

scripts.build:schema: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const schema=require('./wp-schema.ts'); fs.writeFileSync('./wp-content/mu-plugins/cnf-setup/schema.json', JSON.stringify(schema.default || schema, null, 2));"

author: Wordsco
